# Work Order Management System - Project Setup

## Project Overview
Progressive Web App (PWA) for contracting company managing handyman, plumbing, and appliance repair work orders. Works on Android, iPhone, and desktop with offline capabilities and push notifications.

## User Roles
- **Call Center**: Create and manage work orders
- **Manager**: Assign orders to field teams
- **Field Worker**: View assigned orders and mark as completed

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Prisma (Database ORM)
- NextAuth.js (Authentication)
- Firebase (Push Notifications)
- PWA Support (@ducanh2912/next-pwa)
- Vercel (Deployment)
